description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience. Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis. Students interested in independent research may enroll in BIO 297 or BIO 398. Each course requires a faculty supervisor, who will make the decision as to which course is appropriate. Pass/No Pass. Offered each semester and during Interim. Prerequisite: approval of instructor.
name: Independent Research (.25, .5, 1.0)
notes: This is the 0.25 credit version of this course.
title: Independent Research
